title: MINECRAFT CONSOLE CLIENT[1.8.0]——还在困扰为了输入一个指令打开MC？[永久更新]
author: 哆啦抱着老鼠
txt_content:
本帖最后由 哆啦抱着老鼠 于 2014-12-14 16:13 编辑 

[来源=http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding/minecraft-tools/1263927-win-mac-linux-minecraft-console-client-1-8-0]


Have you ever been annoyed by having to run Minecraft just to type a command?
Or high memory usage just because you have multiple Minecraft windows opened?

Minecraft Console Client is a lightweight app that will make your life easier! Able to connect to any minecraft server, both offline and online mode, it enables you to send commands and receive text messages in a fast and easy way without having to open the main Minecraft game.

But that's not all! Through various automation that can be enabled using the configuration file such as an anti-AFK system and alerts on specific words, this client is useful for server adminstration and automated scripts! Using the source code, you can even create a chatbot using the built-in API!

你是否曾经为了执行一个指令就打开Minecraft而烦恼？或者你打开的多个窗口耗尽了你的内存？
Minecraft Console Client 是一个轻量级的应用，让你可以更轻松！能够连接任何MC服务器，不管有无正版验证，他可以让你使用一个快而简单的方法去执行指令或聊天，无需打开整个minecraft。
但是此应用远远不止这些！通过各种支持的自动化操作使用例如anti-AFK和警告，只需输入特殊的命令，这个软件对服务器管理员或者自动化脚本很有用！使用公开的源代码，你可以创造一个聊天机器人使用built-in接口！

系统要求：Window XP或更高 + .net framework 4.0或更高 [链接]
Mac或者Linux + Mono framework [链接]

Features :
Uses only 10MB of RAM!
Supports both online-mode and offline-mode
Send text messages and commands to the server
Receive messages from server with text coloring!
Command-line usage for automated scripts (batch...)
Includes a Bot API and some bots : Alerts, AntiAFK, AutoRelog, Log, Hangman game.
特点：只使用10MB的内存！
支持正版验证或离线模式
发送文字或者命令到服务器
带颜色的输出
自动化脚本命令行（类似bat/sh之类的）
内置机器人API和一些机器人：Alerts, AntiAFK, AutoRelog, Log, Hangman game

Usage :
Download the app, unzip the archive and run it.
Enter the username, password ("-" for offline mode) and server IP to connect.
Enjoy!
用法：下载、解压、运行
输入用户名密码（用户名为'-'则为离线模式）和服务器IP（域名）
尽情享♂受吧

命令行参数：
MinecraftClient.exe [username [password [server ["/cmd"]]]]

下载：下载 [若adf.ly不可用请点此]
（尊重原作者，使用adf.ly）
源代码 [若adf.ly不可用请点此]
github上也有源代码方便你fork
If you are willing to help the main project please consider forking & pulling the Indev branch instead :)
